Monologue.Current: Доктор Кадоваки{Line}“О, {Char Squall}.{Line} У тебя сегодня экзамен, верно?”
Monologue.Original: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“Oh, {Char Squall}.{Line} Your exam’s today, right?”

Monologue.Current: Доктор Кадоваки{Line}“Как твой лоб?”
Monologue.Original: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“How’s that forehead doing?”

Monologue.Current: Доктор Кадоваки{Line}“Будь осторожен.”
Monologue.Original: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“Take it easy, now.”

Monologue.Current: Доктор Кадоваки{Line}“Что случилось?{Line} Ты снова поранился?”
Monologue.Original: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“What is it?{Line} Are you injured again?”

Monologue.Current: Доктор Кадоваки{Line}“{Char Squall}, будь душкой, присмотри{Line} за вещами, пока я не вернусь, ладно?”
Monologue.Original: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“{Char Squall}, be a dear, and take care{Line} of things till I get back, ok?”

Monologue.Current: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“What is all this{Line} faction mumbo jumbo?{Line} It’s ridiculous.”
Monologue.Original: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“What is all this{Line} faction mumbo jumbo?{Line} It’s ridiculous.”

Monologue.Current: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“You’re looking for Cid?{Line} As you can see, he’s not here.”
Monologue.Original: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“You’re looking for Cid?{Line} As you can see, he’s not here.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“Do you have any idea?”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“Do you have any idea?”

Monologue.Current: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“Hmm...{Line} Xu might know.”{Next}“I have no idea{Line} where she is though.”
Monologue.Original: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“Hmm...{Line} Xu might know.”{Next}“I have no idea{Line} where she is though.”

Monologue.Current: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“Why are you looking{Line} for him anyway?”
Monologue.Original: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“Why are you looking{Line} for him anyway?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“I need to inform him that there{Line} may be missiles heading this way.”{Next}“You should get out of here, too.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“I need to inform him that there{Line} may be missiles heading this way.”{Next}“You should get out of here, too.”

Monologue.Current: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“Are you serious!?”
Monologue.Original: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“Are you serious!?”

Monologue.Current: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“Then I’m definitely{Line} gonna have to stay.”{Next}“If anybody gets hurt,{Line} who’s gonna look after them?”
Monologue.Original: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“Then I’m definitely{Line} gonna have to stay.”{Next}“If anybody gets hurt,{Line} who’s gonna look after them?”

Monologue.Current: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“{Char Squall}, take this.{Line} You’ll probably need it.”
Monologue.Original: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“{Char Squall}, take this.{Line} You’ll probably need it.”

Monologue.Current: Received [Elixir]!
Monologue.Original: Received [Elixir]!

Monologue.Current: “Ouch...{Line} Sorry......”
Monologue.Original: “Ouch...{Line} Sorry......”

Monologue.Current: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“Do you need to see the headmaster?”{Line}(Later){Line}(Yes, now)
Monologue.Original: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“Do you need to see the headmaster?”{Line}(Later){Line}(Yes, now)

Monologue.Current: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“Uh huh. Alright.”
Monologue.Original: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“Uh huh. Alright.”

Monologue.Current: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“Well, the headmaster is kind of...”
Monologue.Original: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“Well, the headmaster is kind of...”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“I’m ok now, doctor.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“I’m ok now, doctor.”

Monologue.Current: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“Are you sure?”
Monologue.Original: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“Are you sure?”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Yes,{Line} I believe I’m done crying.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Yes,{Line} I believe I’m done crying.”

Monologue.Current: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“...Just take it easy, ok?”
Monologue.Original: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“...Just take it easy, ok?”

Monologue.Current: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“He’s got a lot on his mind.”
Monologue.Original: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“He’s got a lot on his mind.”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“I have important news that{Line} I must share with all of you.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“I have important news that{Line} I must share with all of you.”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“The Garden is being repaired right now.”{Next}“We’ll leave FH immediately after it’s{Line} finished. We’re going on a journey.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“The Garden is being repaired right now.”{Next}“We’ll leave FH immediately after it’s{Line} finished. We’re going on a journey.”

Monologue.Current: Доктор Кадоваки{Line}“Что? Ты хочешь со мной сыграть?”{Line}Да{Line}Нет
Monologue.Original: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“What? You wanna play a card game?”{Line}Yes{Line}No

Monologue.Current: Доктор Кадоваки{Line}“Когда-то я неплохо играла...{Line} Правда, это было давно.”
Monologue.Original: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“You know, I used to play a lot.{Line} Not lately, though.”

Monologue.Current: You need 5 or more{Line}cards to play.
Monologue.Original: You need 5 or more{Line}cards to play.

Monologue.Current: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“Congratulations, {Char Squall}. I heard you{Line} defeated all 4 suits of the CC group.”{Next}“Oh, me...?{Line} I have nothing to do with the CC group.”{Next}“...Well, I guess it’s ok{Line} to tell you.”{Next}“I was the CC group King for a{Line} long time, but I passed the position over{Line} to another girl 4 years ago.”{Next}“Oh, you want to know who she is?{Line} Sorry, I can’t tell you.”{Next}“Look for her yourself.{Line} You’ll probably find her soon, now that{Line} you’ve defeated the 4-Suits.”
Monologue.Original: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“Congratulations, {Char Squall}. I heard you{Line} defeated all 4 suits of the CC group.”{Next}“Oh, me...?{Line} I have nothing to do with the CC group.”{Next}“...Well, I guess it’s ok{Line} to tell you.”{Next}“I was the CC group King for a{Line} long time, but I passed the position over{Line} to another girl 4 years ago.”{Next}“Oh, you want to know who she is?{Line} Sorry, I can’t tell you.”{Next}“Look for her yourself.{Line} You’ll probably find her soon, now that{Line} you’ve defeated the 4-Suits.”

Monologue.Current: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“Hi there, {Char Squall}.”{Next}“Oh my... It’s not everyday,{Line} I see you walk around with a girl!{Line} Is she your girlfriend?”

Monologue.Current: Yes{Line}No, just showing her around
Monologue.Original: Yes{Line}No, just showing her around

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“Yes.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“Yes.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“Are you serious!? {Char Squall}!?”
Monologue.Original: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“Are you serious!? {Char Squall}!?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“I’m gonna take it seriously.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“I’m gonna take it seriously.”

Monologue.Current: I’m serious{Line}Just kidding
Monologue.Original: I’m serious{Line}Just kidding

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“I’m serious.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“I’m serious.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“Woo. I’m speechless.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“Woo. I’m speechless.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“I’m seriously joking.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“I’m seriously joking.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“It’s just a joke.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“It’s just a joke.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“Oh...”
Monologue.Original: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“Oh...”

Monologue.Current: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“Well, I guess that’s a{Line} pretty good one for you.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“Well, I guess that’s a{Line} pretty good one for you.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“No, I’m just showing her around.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“No, I’m just showing her around.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“{Char Squall}...”
Monologue.Original: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“{Char Squall}...”

Monologue.Current: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“Gosh, can’t you just say{Line} ‘yes’ for fun?”
Monologue.Original: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“Gosh, can’t you just say{Line} ‘yes’ for fun?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“All right, then, ‘yes’.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“All right, then, ‘yes’.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“Say it like you mean it.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“Say it like you mean it.”

Monologue.Current: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“Ha ha ha...{Line} You guys are cute.”
Monologue.Original: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“Ha ha ha...{Line} You guys are cute.”

Monologue.Current: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“Oh, do you guys know where{Line} Headmaster Cid is?”{Next}“That guy works too hard.{Line} Tell him to come see me{Line} when you see him.”
Monologue.Original: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“Oh, do you guys know where{Line} Headmaster Cid is?”{Next}“That guy works too hard.{Line} Tell him to come see me{Line} when you see him.”

Monologue.Current: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“Tell Headmaster Cid to come to the{Line} infirmary when you see him.”
Monologue.Original: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“Tell Headmaster Cid to come to the{Line} infirmary when you see him.”
